snippet: Hafthor Julius Bjornsson, an Icelandic strongman best known for lifting cars or tugging trucks or throwing barrels, has parlayed his imposing size into a role on “Game of Thrones.”
abstract: Profile of Hafthor Julius Bjornsson, an Icelandic strongman best known for lifting cars, tugging trucks and throwing barrels; with prompting from HBO producers, he has parlayed his imposing size and strength into role of the Mountain on television show Game of Thrones.
lead_paragraph: Hafthor Julius Bjornsson, an Icelandic strongman best known for lifting cars or tugging trucks or throwing barrels, has parlayed his imposing size into a role on “Game of Thrones.”

headline.seo: Icelandic Strongman Does Heavy Lifting on a Second Career as an Actor
headline.main: Even Brutes Can Learn to Cry
headline.print_headline: Even Ogres Can Learn to Cry
